channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Kingsley. Tune in to our Beauty Gifts show for inspiration on festive gifts and spoil your loved ones this Christmas. Today we've got a host of treats from leading haircare brand Philip Kingsley.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Loves...
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see our exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Liz Earle Radiant Wishes Come True
channel.desc: Liz Earle's range of products feature a high concentration of herbs, vitamins and essential oils, creating a simple routine to cleanse, hydrate and protect the skin.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Tools & Accessories Gifts
channel.desc: This new show will focus on reinforcing the three golden rules - cleanse, tone and moisturise. Caroline will also explain how to choose the right moisturiser for the season and your skin type.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas with Alpha H
channel.desc: Looking for the perfect present for a beauty lover? The search is over, because Alpha-H is here with their wonderful array of giftable formulas that everyone will love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Kingsley. Tune in to our Beauty Gifts show for inspiration on festive gifts and spoil your loved ones this Christmas. Today we've got a host of treats from leading haircare brand Philip Kingsley.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Gatineau Beauty Gifts
channel.desc: Gatineau fan? Us too! Join us as we talk all things beauty with this specialist brand, with a whole host of luxurious, must-have formulas any skincare sage would love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifting
channel.desc: Featuring a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, this show aims to inspire you in your choice of festive gifts for the special people in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Dyson
channel.desc: Birthday, anniversary or just because? Whatever the occasion, join us for ideas and inspiration for truly pampering presents in our Beauty Gifts showcase. In this show it's all about Dyson.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty's Best Finds
channel.desc: Up your beauty game with our best finds in the industry, from favourite formulas to the latest releases. Whether you want to shake up your make-up or step up your skincare, find it here.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: The Gift of Beauty
channel.desc: Find the right beauty gift for friends and family from skincare must-haves and make-up essentials to on-trend nail colours and beauty gadgets.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Give the gift of beauty whether it's a birthday, anniversary or just because! Join us for ideas and inspiration for truly pampering presents.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Molton Brown
channel.desc: Featuring an exquisite blend of fragrances from all over the world, Molton Brown's indulgent bath and body treats are the perfect pampering gift for loved ones.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Floral Street Fragrance
channel.desc: Dive into the essence of modern British fragrance with Floral Street. Founded by beauty powerhouse Michelle Feeney, explore scents that champion eco-responsibility at their core.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tarte Cosmetics
channel.desc: This show features high performance natural products from Tarte Cosmetics, including everything from Amazonian clay to maracuja oil. Find a wide variety of glamorous eco-chic products you'll love.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Feel Good Beauty with Alison Young
channel.desc: Discover beauty that lets you feel as good as you look with a little help from Alison Young, including marvellous make-up, special skincare and much more.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Christmas Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Take the stress out of Christmas shopping and browse our marvellous selection of gift ideas to find the perfect present for someone special.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis The Gift Of Great Skin
channel.desc: We bring you the beauty of Elemis - famed for their premier spa and salon treatments. Tune in and discover incredible value skincare, perfect for gifting or treating yourself to.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifting
channel.desc: Featuring a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, this show aims to inspire you in your choice of festive gifts for the special people in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gifts with Alison Young
channel.desc: Alison Young presents a wide spectrum of beauty gifts, from skincare to cosmetics, to inspire you in your choice of festive gifts for the special people in your life.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Tili Beauty
channel.desc: Effortlessly update your daily beauty routine with Tili, from beauty tools and everyday essentials, to expert developed fitness and wellbeing items, we've got you covered. Try it, love it with Tili.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Gift Ideas
channel.desc: Give the gift of beauty whether it's a birthday, anniversary or just because! Join us for ideas and inspiration for truly pampering presents.
